summary.description:
Another look at the eigenvalues of a population matrix model.

Theoretical Population Modeling for Understanding Growth Rates.

Visualizing how the growth rates responds to alterations in life history traits.

Hanley B, Connelly P, & Dennis B. 2019. IsoPOPd: Interactive software to understand how elements in a population matrix model influence the asymptotic population growth rate [Software]. Cornell University Library eCommons Repository. doi: https://doi.org/10.7298/bcmg-7w08
summary.name: IsoPOPd
